casebody.data:
No. D-2472. In the Matter of Discipline of Steven Jay Rozan. 561 U.S. 1004, 130 S. Ct. 3497,

177 L. Ed. 2d 1084,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 5192. June 21, 2010.

Steven Jay Rozan, of Houston, Texas, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court, and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
